page.title: 13SCHOOLS
page.content: There are three schools in our survey patch.One of them is the {Herringham Primary School}it has aproximately 275 children in it. Another is the{Chadwell Primary } {School}with about 225,both are in Chadwell. Last, but not least, comes the{Manor School}in Tilbury. This has approximately{450 children}in its classes and includes a large purpose-built nursery school for the 3 and 4 year olds. This building is partially funded by the Community Help Project and includes a post for a Liasion Officer who works with both school and parents at home.It originally came about because of the number of disadvantaged families there The small school in West Tilbury was closed some time ago and is now used as a depot by the Education Departmen.
